casebody.data:
Dianne WILLIAMS, Cyril Jefferson, Donna Carter, Darlene Colbert Türner, and Gregory Depland, Individually and on Behalf of Their Father, Frederick, Depland (D)
v.
TOURO INFIRMARY, Dr. Charlane Liles, and Dr. Theodore J. Borgman Dianne Williams, Cyril Jefferson, Donna Carter, Darlene Colbert Turner and Gregory Depland, Individually and on Behalf of Their Father, Frederick Depland
v.
Touro Infirmary, Dr. Charlane Liles and Dr. Theodore J. Borgman NO. 2018-CC-1268 Supreme Court of Louisiana. October 29, 2018 Denied. HUGHES, J., would grant.
